data.actual_result: The app keeps scrolling back up every few seconds System: Testflight 1.7.8 (44)(latest), iOS 10.1.1
data.expected_result: You can scroll down without interruption
data.short_description: Auto scroll-up when viewing unread messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel with >50 unread messages - Load more messages (by scrolling up or tapping the blue unread bar) - Scroll down slowly
